name: Tik Tac Toe
description:
Play The Game With Your Friends!.

click on the empty spots and try to get 3  in a row or columns and horizontal areas and win the game.

~~ Available On All Pc Devices

~~ Game Developed With Python, Pygame Library

~~ Game developed By: Habib Ismail any questions or concerns OR problems message me on IG: bruh_habib1 I will answer you right away.

~~ X AND O assets where by Kenney Huge thanks to them.
